titles.title: Recognizing the launch of the Redmond Space District in partnership with the City of Redmond and OneRedmond, showcasing the growth of Redmond's Space Cluster.
Recognizing the launch of the Redmond Space District in partnership with the City of Redmond and OneRedmond, showcasing the growth of Redmond's Space Cluster.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology.

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes the growing space industry in the Redmond Space District in Redmond, Washington.
